ygData.subject: Re: The Seige
ygData.msgSnippet: Hate me? Im honored. Really, I am. Im so glad i can be added to your hit list with the rest of the kids that pick on you at school.

Hate me? Im honored. Really, I am. Im so glad i can be added to your hit list 
with the rest of the kids that pick on you at school.

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2 FAMILY="SANSSERIF" FACE="Century Gothic" LANG="0"><B>Hate me? Im honored. Really, I am. Im so glad i can be added to your hit list
